cheritan.desc: Cheritan Farmhouse, tucked away in the peaceful middle of the forest, provides a dreamlike haven from the bustling city life. Our farmhouse is set up to provide a perfect balance of leisure and enjoyment, guaranteeing you and your loved ones a memorable stay. Special features of Cheritan Farmhouse include a wonderful garden area, a cool swimming pool, a fully stocked kitchen with dishes and bowls, and a barbeque area for delicious meals. A 43-inch TV, WiFi, a Bluetooth audio system, and access to Netflix, Prime, Hotstar, Aha, and ZEE5 provide plenty of entertainment options. Play games like chess, carroms, shuttle, cricket, and shuttle to make sure everyone has a good time.
cheritan.subdesc: Over the last several decades, urban investors have developed an interest in purchasing rural acreage and converting it into holiday homes or lavish resorts with plenty of greenery and scenic views. Since the vertical rise of structures in urban centres leaves little room for greenery and open space, demand for such housing choices has surged. As a result, individuals have begun investing actively in property in distant places. A farmhouse is one of these housing types since it enables the investor to possess both property and privacy.

blueberry.desc: Blueberry Farmhouse offers a perfect blend of elegance and tranquility, huddled in the heart of Moinabad’s lush landscapes. The spacious and elegantly furnished bedrooms offer a welcoming atmosphere, while outdoor spaces are perfect for bonfires, outdoor dining, and relaxed evenings.Just a short drive from Hyderabad, Blueberry Farmhouse provides an unparalleled opportunity to experience nature’s serenity without sacrificing comfort. Book your stay now and immerse yourself in a luxurious countryside retreat.

sakethavanam.desc: TRADITIONALLY FARMHOUSES are simply homes built on agricultural lands to house and protect who owned or worked the land. The term Farmhouse isn't necessarily connected to a particular style identified by a fixed set of features, but a setting for a way of life. This is most likely why its appeal seems to be timeless.
sakethavanam.subdesc: Over the last several decades, urban investors have developed an interest in purchasing rural acreage and converting it into holiday homes or lavish resorts with plenty of greenery and scenic views. Since the vertical rise of structures in urban centres leaves little room for greenery and open space, demand for such housing choices has surged. As a result, individuals have begun investing actively in property in distant places. A farmhouse is one of these housing types since it enables the investor to possess both property and privacy.

When night falls, light up the bonfire, fire up the grill, and enjoy delicious eats with your crew under the open sky. You’ll find plenty of games and activities to keep everyone entertained. Just a quick drive from Hyderabad, Tranquil Retreat gives you the perfect combo of seclusion, fun, and all the comforts you crave.

verde-retreat.desc: Just outside the city in Tondupally lies Verde Retreat, a calm 4 BHK escape perfect for those longing for a quiet break. Surrounded by nature, it’s a cozy haven for solo travelers, couples, or groups to relax, reset, and breathe freely.
verde-retreat.subdesc: The green outdoors are ideal for nature walks, light play, or simply soaking up the serenity. Inside, enjoy restful nights with double beds, AC, a flat-screen TV, fridge, and ample storage—crafted for total comfort and ease. Let Verde Retreat be your peaceful destination to reconnect with nature and yourself in the charming Bhanur countryside.

yash-farm.desc: Step into tranquility at Yash Farm, a 3 BHK farmhouse nestled in the peaceful surroundings of Chinnashapur. Perfect for small groups, couples, or solo travelers, this countryside haven offers the ideal escape from everyday noise and city chaos.Take in the calm atmosphere with leisurely walks under shady trees, peaceful reading outdoors, or quiet chats with loved ones. The farmhouse itself is cozy and well-equipped—air-conditioned rooms with double beds, a flat-screen TV, mini-fridge, and enough space to settle in comfortably.
yash-farm.subdesc: Whether you're seeking rest, reflection, or reconnection, Yash Farm offers a refreshing experience in the heart of nature. It’s more than just a stay—it’s where serenity and comfort come together.

charvi.desc: Charvi offers a tranquil escape just outside the city, nestled in the heart of nature in Bhanur. This peaceful 3 BHK sanctuary is the perfect destination for those seeking a quiet retreat away from the hustle and bustle. Whether you're a solo traveler, a couple, or a group, Charvi provides a serene environment to relax, unwind, and recharge.
charvi.subdesc: The expansive outdoor area allows guests to enjoy leisurely walks through lush greenery, partake in outdoor activities, or simply bask in the calm ambiance of the surroundings. Inside, the farmhouse is designed for comfort, featuring cozy, air-conditioned rooms with double beds, a flat-screen TV, a mini-fridge, and generous storage space—ensuring a cozy and relaxing stay. Charvi is the ideal location for anyone wanting to reconnect with nature and experience peaceful relaxation in a scenic Bhanur setting.

tranqui.desc: Discover New Nature, a serene 2 BHK farmhouse located in the calm surroundings of Narayanpur. Tucked just outside the city, it's the ideal getaway for those yearning for a peaceful retreat. Perfect for individuals, couples, or small groups, New Nature promises an escape into tranquility and natural beauty.
tranqui.subdesc: Guests can explore the expansive outdoors, enjoy leisure walks amid lush greenery, or unwind with light outdoor activities. Indoors, you'll find two cozy air-conditioned bedrooms with double beds, a flat-screen TV, mini-fridge, and ample storage—all designed for comfort and relaxation.

casa-plams.desc: Casa Palms is a serene 7 BHK retreat in Gunded, offering a peaceful break from the everyday noise. Cradled by nature, it welcomes solo guests, couples, and groups who seek space to rest or reflect. It's perfect for peaceful stays and mindful escapes.
casa-plams.subdesc: Wander through wide green lawns, enjoy outdoor fun, or simply sit back and soak in the stillness. Inside, comfort features include air-conditioned rooms, cozy double beds, a TV, mini-fridge, and convenient storage. With spacious common areas, it’s also ideal for small celebrations or bonding time with loved ones. Enjoy morning tea on the patio, birdsong in the background, or a quiet evening under the stars. Every corner of Casa Palms is designed to help you slow down and savor the moment.Let Casa Palms be your pause—where Gunded’s calm landscapes restore your balance and inner peace.

new-nature.desc: Discover New Nature, a serene 2 BHK farmhouse located in the calm surroundings of Narayanpur. Tucked just outside the city, it's the ideal getaway for those yearning for a peaceful retreat. Perfect for individuals, couples, or small groups, New Nature promises an escape into tranquility and natural beauty.
new-nature.subdesc: Guests can explore the expansive outdoors, enjoy leisure walks amid lush greenery, or unwind with light outdoor activities. Indoors, you'll find two cozy air-conditioned bedrooms with double beds, a flat-screen TV, mini-fridge, and ample storage—all designed for comfort and relaxation.

pleasant-view.desc: Pleasant View, a charming 3BHK farmhouse located in Nyalata, offers a peaceful escape just outside Hyderabad. Whether you're looking to unwind for the weekend or planning a special celebration, this serene getaway is the perfect spot to relax, recharge, and make memories.
pleasant-view.subdesc: Surrounded by nature, Pleasant View is designed to give you that 'away-from-it-all' feeling, without going too far from the city. The highlight is? A large private swimming pool where you can cool off and take in the natural beauty around you.Inside, the farmhouse is spacious and well-equipped with air-conditioned rooms, luxurious king-size beds, televisions, refrigerators, and plenty of storage for everything you need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.Whether it’s a family outing, a chill weekend with friends, or a private event, Pleasant View at Nyalata has everything you need for a memorable experience.

the-loft.desc: Tucked away in the peaceful surroundings of Chatrakanigudem, The Loft is a cozy 1BHK farmhouse that’s perfect for couples, solo travelers, or small families looking for a quiet escape from the city buzz. Just a short drive from Hyderabad, this charming spot is ideal for a weekend of rest, relaxation, or a low-key celebration.
the-loft.subdesc: Though compact, The Loft makes no compromises on comfort. The space is thoughtfully designed with a spacious air-conditioned bedroom, a comfy king-size bed, TV, fridge, and essential amenities to make your stay easy and comfortable.Step outside and you’ll find a private swimming pool surrounded by greenery—perfect for a morning dip or a sunset unwind. Whether you're here to disconnect or celebrate something special, The Loft in Chatrakanigudem offers just the right mix of peace and privacy

jk-farmhouse.desc: Welcome to JK Farmhouse, a beautifully designed 3 BHK retreat set in the tranquil environs of Mansanpally. Offering a seamless blend of comfort, privacy, and natural charm, this farmhouse provides the perfect setting for those looking to escape the noise of urban life. Whether you're a solo traveler, a couple in search of a romantic weekend, or a group seeking meaningful time together, JK Farmhouse delivers an unmatched experience.
jk-farmhouse.subdesc: Spread across a spacious outdoor landscape, the property invites you to relax, unwind, and reconnect with nature. Breathe in the fresh air, indulge in a morning stroll, or simply enjoy your coffee amidst the greenery. The interiors are thoughtfully furnished with air-conditioned bedrooms, plush double beds, flat-screen TVs, mini-fridges, and ample storage space, ensuring your stay is nothing short of luxurious. With modern amenities and a serene environment, JK Farmhouse promises a stay that’s both restful and newly fresh.

luna-casa.desc: Planning a family outing or a getaway with friends? Discover Luna Casa, a beautiful 6 BHK farmhouse tucked away in the serene surroundings of Medchal-Malkajgiri. Perfect for bonding and relaxation, this spacious retreat blends modern comforts with natural charm to create the ultimate escape from the city.
luna-casa.subdesc: Inside, you'll find well-appointed, air-conditioned rooms, cozy double beds, a flat-screen TV, mini-fridge, and plenty of storage. Step outside to enjoy wide open spaces, ideal for outdoor fun, quiet conversations, or simply soaking in the peaceful vibe.Whether you're celebrating, reconnecting, or just taking a break, Luna Casa offers a private, comfortable space designed for unforgettable moments with your loved ones.

ar-farmhouse.desc: Escape the city's hustle and embrace tranquility at ar farmhouse, a charming 5 BHK retreat nestled in the peaceful locality of Bowrampet. Surrounded by lush greenery and just a short drive from the Outer Ring Road, this farmhouse offers the perfect blend of rustic charm and modern amenities, making it ideal for family gatherings, weekend getaways, or intimate celebrations.
ar-farmhouse.subdesc: Inside, ar farmhouse boasts spacious, air-conditioned rooms furnished with comfortable beds, flat-screen TVs, and ample storage. The open-plan living area is designed for relaxation and socializing, while the fully equipped kitchen caters to your culinary needs. Step outside to discover a private pool, expansive lawns, and a gazebo—perfect for evening chats or outdoor dining. Whether you're planning a special occasion or simply seeking a peaceful retreat, ar-farmhouse provides a serene and private environment for unforgettable moments with loved ones.

heritage.desc: Heritage is a peaceful 2 BHK farmhouse located in Jeedipally, Hyderabad. Surrounded by greenery and fresh air, this farmhouse is perfect for a quiet weekend escape or a small family gathering. The space is private, well-maintained, and designed to give you comfort and relaxation.
heritage.subdesc: Inside the farmhouse, you will find two cozy bedrooms with double beds, air conditioning, clean bathrooms, a TV, and a mini fridge. There is plenty of space to move around and feel at home. The outdoor area is ideal for enjoying nature, sitting under the trees, or letting kids play freely on the open lawn. Heritage is a great choice if you are looking to spend quality time with your loved ones away from the noise of the city. Whether you are planning a short trip or a peaceful celebration, this farmhouse offers everything you need for a calm and enjoyable stay near Hyderabad.

essence-farm.desc: Essence Farm is a luxurious 5 BHK farmhouse located in Rimmanaguda, Hyderabad. This spacious retreat is perfect for large family gatherings, weekend celebrations, or corporate team outings. Surrounded by open green spaces and peaceful surroundings, Essence Farm offers the ideal escape from city life.
essence-farm.subdesc: The farmhouse features five fully furnished bedrooms with air conditioning, soft beds, clean bathrooms, televisions, and ample storage. The modern kitchen and dining area make it easy to host meals and events. Outside, the wide lawns and open seating areas are great for games, parties, or simply relaxing with your group. Essence Farm combines comfort, space, and privacy to give you an unforgettable stay. Whether you're planning a birthday, a reunion, or a team retreat, this farmhouse offers everything you need for a refreshing and enjoyable experience close to Hyderabad.

aish-farm.desc: Aish Farm in Venkatapuram is a peaceful 4BHK farmhouse retreat, ideal for those seeking a peaceful escape from city life. Drawing close in the heart of nature, this serene getaway is perfect for solo travelers, couples, or groups. Guests can enjoy restful walks through lush greenery, unwind in the spacious outdoor area, or simply relax amidst the calm atmosphere.
aish-farm.subdesc: Inside, the farmhouse offers four comfortable, air-conditioned bedrooms, each featuring double beds, flat-screen TVs, mini-fridges, and ample storage space—ensuring a cozy and restful stay. Aish Farm invites you to reconnect with nature and recharge in total comfort.

cherry-farm.desc: Just a short drive from the city, Cherry Farm in Ranga Reddy offers a refreshing retreat surrounded by nature. This quiet getaway is perfect for those wanting to unwind and leave behind the city’s hectic pace. Whether you're exploring alone, spending quality time as a couple, or relaxing with friends, Cherry Farm delivers calm and comfort in equal measure.
cherry-farm.subdesc: The spacious 3 BHK farmhouse sits on lush grounds ideal for nature walks, outdoor games, or simply enjoying the serene landscape. Indoors, guests are welcomed with cozy, air-conditioned rooms complete with double beds, a flat-screen TV, mini-fridge, and plenty of storage. Everything is set up to make your stay as peaceful as possible. Cherry Farm offers a rare blend of comfort and nature, making it a top choice for peaceful escapes and weekend regeneration.

pooja-farmhouse.desc: Escape the busy city and find peace at Pooja Farmhouse, a serene 1BHK retreat located in BB Nagar. Surrounded by lush greenery, this charming farmhouse is perfect for solo travelers, couples, or small groups looking to unwind. The air-conditioned interiors feature a double bed, flat-screen TV, mini-fridge, and ample storage, offering all the comforts of home. Step outside and breathe in nature as you stroll through the peaceful landscape or simply relax in the calm ambiance.
pooja-farmhouse.subdesc: Whether you're planning a quiet weekend getaway or a short staycation, Pooja Farmhouse provides the ideal setting to disconnect from the digital noise and reconnect with yourself or your loved ones. Enjoy your morning tea in the garden , listen to the soothing sounds of nature, or spend your evenings under the stars. With its blend of simplicity and comfort, Pooja Farmhouse promises a refreshing escape that leaves you feeling recharged and at peace.

bhavani-farmhouse.desc: Bhavani Farmhouse is a serene 4BHK retreat nestled in the lap of nature, located in the peaceful Medchal-Malkajgiri area, just beyond the city’s edge. Perfectly designed for peace, it offers a refreshing escape for solo travelers, couples, families, or groups looking to unwind from the hustle and bustle of urban life.
bhavani-farmhouse.subdesc: Set within expansive green grounds, guests can enjoy peaceful walks, outdoor relaxation, or quiet time in nature. The spacious 4 BHK farmhouse features air-conditioned rooms with double beds, flat-screen TVs, a mini-fridge, and ample storage — ensuring maximum comfort during your stay. Every moment at Bhavani Farmhouse invites you to slow down, breathe deeply, and reconnect with the natural world.

kmm-farmhouse.desc: KMM Farmhouse, a charming 5 BHK farmhouse located in Timmapur, offers a peaceful escape just outside Hyderabad. Whether you're looking to unwind for the weekend or planning a special celebration, this serene getaway is the perfect spot to relax, recharge, and make memories.
kmm-farmhouse.subdesc: Surrounded by nature, KMM Farmhouse is designed to give you that 'away-from-it-all' feeling without going too far from the city. The highlight? A large private swimming pool where you can cool off and take in the natural beauty around you.Inside, the farmhouse is spacious and well-equipped with air-conditioned rooms, luxurious king-size beds, televisions, refrigerators, and plenty of storage for everything you need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.Whether it’s a family outing, a chill weekend with friends, or a private event, KMM Farmhouse at Timmapur has everything you need for a memorable experience.

prakruthi-farm.desc: Prakruthi Farm is a tranquil 3BHK retreat located in the heart of nature, just outside the city in peaceful Ranga Reddy. It’s an ideal escape for solo travelers, couples, or groups seeking calm away from city life. The serene setting offers space to relax, unwind, and recharge.Outside, lush greenery welcomes you for leisurely walks, outdoor games, or simply soaking in nature’s peace. Inside, the farmhouse is well-equipped with air-conditioned rooms, double beds, flat-screen TVs, mini-fridge, and ample storage to ensure a comfortable stay.
prakruthi-farm.subdesc: The spacious layout makes it perfect for family gatherings or friendly get-togethers. A fully functional kitchen is also available, allowing guests to cook their favorite meals at their own pace. Whether you’re staying for a day or a weekend, every moment at Prakruthi Farm brings you closer to nature and peace of mind. For those looking to reconnect with nature and enjoy quiet comfort, Prakruthi Farm in Ranga Reddy is the perfect getaway.

alphonso.desc: Discover a perfect blend of sophistication and serenity at Alphonso Farmhouse, an exclusive 5BHK retreat set amidst the lush landscapes of Gudur. Designed for those seeking elegance, privacy, and comfort, this premium getaway is ideal for family vacations, corporate offsites, and private celebrations.
alphonso.subdesc: Unwind in a private swimming pool, relax amidst expansive landscaped gardens, and enjoy a seamless blend of modern amenities with nature’s serenity. The spacious, well-appointed bedrooms offer a warm and sophisticated ambiance, while the open-air spaces are perfect for bonfire evenings, outdoor dining, and leisurely gatherings.Just a short drive from Hyderabad, Alphonso Farmhouse offers an escape into tranquility without compromising on luxury. Book your stay today and immerse yourself in an unparalleled countryside experience.

hangout-haven-farmhouse.desc: Welcome to Hangout Haven Farmhouse, a peaceful 2BHK retreat located nestled in the lush surroundings of Kucharam, just a short drive from Hyderabad. Perfect for weekend getaways, small family gatherings, or chill hangouts with friends, this charming farmhouse blends comfort with nature.
hangout-haven-farmhouse.subdesc: The farmhouse features 2 spacious bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, a clean and cozy living area, and an open lawn ideal for bonfires, BBQ nights, and games. With a calm rural vibe, it’s the perfect spot to relax, refresh, and escape city noise. Whether you're looking for a budget-friendly staycation or a private space to unwind, Hangout Haven is your go-to farmhouse for comfort, greenery, and good times. Book your stay now and experience a laid-back countryside hangout like never before.

kmr-farm.desc: Welcome to KMR Farm, a cozy 2BHK farmhouse nestled in the serene landscapes of Rangareddy, just a short drive from Hyderabad. Surrounded by greenery and open space, this peaceful retreat is perfect for family stays, small parties, or relaxing weekends away from the city buzz.
kmr-farm.subdesc: The farmhouse offers two comfortable bedrooms, a living area, a fully equipped kitchen, and open outdoor space ideal for get-togethers, BBQs, and fun activities. Whether you're looking to unwind with your loved ones or host a private gathering, KMR Farm delivers comfort and calm at your pace. Experience simplicity, privacy, and fresh air all in one stay a perfect blend of countryside charm and home style living.

kp-farmhouse.desc: Escape to KP Farmhouse, a peaceful 2BHK getaway located in the quiet village of Naincheru, just outside Hyderabad. This farmhouse is the perfect spot for families, couples, or a small group of friends looking to relax in nature without going too far from the city.
kp-farmhouse.subdesc: Enjoy two spacious bedrooms, a comfy living area, a kitchen for basic cooking, and a large outdoor space ideal for chilling, games, or a private celebration. Whether it's a weekend hangout, a birthday bash, or just a quiet day with your loved ones, KP Farmhouse offers a calm and cozy setting for it all. Surrounded by greenery and fresh air, it's your perfect hideaway for peace, privacy, and pure vibes.
